text: Nathan Joel Marquardt (born April 20, 1979 in Lander, Wyoming) is an American mixed martial artist. He currently fights for the UFC in the middleweight division and fights out of Denver, Colorado. Marquardt holds a second black belt in both Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Jujutsu. His current record is 32 wins, 10 losses and 2 draws. ==Other websites== *Nate Marquardt's Official website Category:Sportspeople from Wyoming Category:Freemont County, Wyoming Category:American mixed martial artists Category:1979 births Category:Living people
title: Nate Marquardt
